reviews.review: Great CO-OP survival game

Esse é mais um daqueles jogos perfeitos para quem gosta da obra prima de ficar matando tudo que ve pela frente sem objetivo nenhum e.e
Pra começar,o jogo é muito bom, é um Survival-Coop-Resist(Ou não depende do ponto de vista)
Bem praticamente tudo o que você faz é matar,matar e matar.
Os graficos do jogo não são tão bons mas isso é a prova que não precisa de grafico pra ser foda.
Jogar com os amigos é realmente muito interessante e divertido,jogo com poucos lados contras
Bem Killing Floor é mais um jogo pra tu jogar com os ''amiguinho''
O que realmente estragou foi os ''Dlc's pq ué,se tu quer uma arminha nova é 8 pila,um personagem 10 pila,um pack de arma 24
e assim vai.
Bem é so isso memo otimo, um jogo otimo pra  aquela glr que adora sair matando que nem um doido.
it is addictive and a fun co-op game with a great community and fantastic to play with randoms and friends

Killing Floor is a fantastic FPS game for those of you looking for horrific monsters and A LOT of violence. I have had a lot of great experiences with other players in this game and it's always refreshing to see such a friendly game community.  The game mechanics are solid and the class system is pretty fun and makes you want to try out the other classes as well! This game has great value and I would recomend it to anyone who is looking for a horror shooter!

Killing failed experiment monsters with a Dual Handcannon 10/10!

Probably the funnest game that involves killing hordes of undead~

The game has a neat perk system so you can choose a particular class and work your levels up, this makes allies being much more important with each individual role. The game has a wide variety of guns to choose from as well, and each map is highly detailed and can contain secrets/mini easter eggs for you to find.

Also with the end of each wave you have to venture out to wherever the trader will be this time around, thats right, no camping until the final wave comes.. My only complaint however is how DLC is advertised and there is so much bloody DLC. DLC for gun variations? No thanks..
(You can actually replace the DLC advertisement video with mods.)

Overall though, a fun co-op game with a decent soundtrack to fight the hordes alongside. Map design is amazing too.
8/10 for it's purpose.

Excellent arcade-style zombie survival.  Multiplayer focused game with great mechanics and good graphics.  Definitely worth picking up on sale if you enjoy arcade-style zombie shooters.  PS - I jump on this game every few months and play and it seems to have a strong and stable multiplayer fanbase and the community isn't toxic as it is in league and other games.

O Jogo é extremamente chato, não traz nada novo. Os movimentos são limitados e sem muita escolha, é impossível subir em telhados para ficar de sniper, rifle ou o diabo que for para e matar “zumbis”. A grande maioria dos mapas são super limitados(e muitas vezes mal feitos). Para piorar o que já é horrível, o jogo não traz nenhum tipo de objetivo, tem como "história" sobreviver a Waves(Ondas) de bichos macabros, para melhor resumir a análise, digo.

O jogo é uma bosta.

What can I say? Good game, great gore level, awesome violence, and great guns to choose from. It is a combination of Counter Strike and Left For Dead. Would recommend this to anybody who loves violence and gore including some awesome FPS gaming.

Killing Floor – коммерческом моде на движке Unreal Tournament 2.

«На самом деле, они не «зомби». Они – «подопытные» из дешевой и грязной программы правительства по изготовлению клонов-солдат. Самые простые могли разве что вцепиться в руку и попробовать схрумкать свою жертву. Те, что побольше, были первыми в очереди на вооружение. Ничего такого – просто бензопила или лезвие. Для начала. Им как раз начали давать пулеметы и ракетницы, когда правительство попыталось втихую закрыть свою секретную программу.

Но, как это обычно бывает, программа закрываться не хотела. Подопытные вырвались на свободу. Ученые не смогли выключить установку для клонирования, и теперь жертвы эксперимента носятся за пределами лаборатории в гневе. Ну, некоторые носятся в гневе, другие плетутся, третьи, будучи в нем, прыгают.
Давно играл с друзьями еще на пиратке, игра супер, всем советую

Well I'm actually pretty new to the game and this is my first review but here goes!
I've never been a fan of these types of "tower defence" games.I consider this one because of the fact that monster come at you at waves and to win you must wipe them out,etc.
However,this game made me rethink about my opinion about them.Perhaps it's too damn well made!Or perhaps I just find it FUN to use a crossbow and double-big-ass-pistols to splatter the brains of a horde of 50 zombies coming at me.
The catch, however is - if you make a mistake ( allow one of the weakest, but most annoying buggers in the game to grab you ) , you die.Except if you have the right perks,which I will now explain.
Perks define your weapons and bonuses.Technically they are classes.There is a pyro,grenadier,sharpshooter (technically made to one shot most zombies using headshots),commando which is kinda heavy weapons,medic and support specialist.Best thing is - you can always switch them!To level a perk requires one or more feats.
(Example : To level up a medic you must heal N points.To level up a sharpshooter you must do N headshots.Each perk or class has its own unique feats and weapons.)
You have to wait a round, however, and you can change perks once per round,during the shopping time.Shopping time is the time between rounds,lasts a minute and there's a predefined spot on the map,the location of which is shown by an arrow in the top left corner of the screen, and a red sort-of misty-light that show you the way after the round has ended.One in the shop, you heal automatically, restock on ammo, get new weapons and if you want to, switch perks.
Depending on the size of your team, the difficulty level and the match length, the zombie numbers range from 20 to 70,in a 10 match duration in Normal solo mode,where you can hone your skills,and 50 to 200 if you have 5 or more teammates, this time in Normal Multiplayer.
Difficulty level is what it should be - measures the damage,health and general smarts of the zombies.
Moving onto the zombies, there are 12 or so kinds of them, ranging from small black spider-like zombies to the Boss, the Patriarch,who has a minigun, rocket launcher, claws, invisibility and when he's close to death, he has 3 health syringes which heal him.He uses 1 syringe per heal.
All in all,there are minor bugs that aren't even close to serious, and are mildly annoying.The game is extremely fun to play, especially with friends.It's also set in Britain so expect lots of British slang.
Now hurry up, you lot, and buy this bloody game while it's on sale!

Jedyne co troche mi sie nie podoba to brak pomysłu na bossa, myśle, że został on zrobiony na szybko i jak dla mnie jest efekt. Sama gra jak najbardziej na + i zachęcam do kupienia oraz zagrania w nią.

4半年ちょっとやっている。途中アカウント変えたり、やれなかった時期はあるが
それを差し引いてもまさか当時２ドルで買ったゲーム（正確にはアカウント変えて２回買ってるので６ドルとＤＬＣ代）で合計４０００時間もplayするとは思わなかったわホント、４０００時間でも多い方ではないこのゲームむしろ私の知り合いの平均的play時間、中にはもうすぐ１００００時間ていう人もいる。
このゲームがいかに中毒性が高いかがわかる。
友達に誘われやり始めたsteamで最初に買ったこのゲーム、私のsteamの歴史＝私のＫＦの歴史といっても言いすぎてない。
今後このゲーム以上にやるゲームなどないきがする、あるとしたらそれはＫＦ２にほかならない。
